channel.title: Vectors
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2zre3xe.jpg[/img]
Once again i went for a simple look but i think i over did it with the c4d

item.title: Vectors
item.dc:creator: @Immortal Immortal
item.description:
@Immortal wrote:

Overcontrasted in areas, too much negative space, text is death, colours don’t blend, effects are pretty much flipped for both sides, effects are boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Vectors
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

exe626:

I think it’s shit. Also, just because you used vector brushing, doesn’t make it a vector.

I may have posted a couple days late. But that doesn’t affect how much I agree with Exe. It’s pretty bad, you tried combining two different styles. You used a vector brush, and tried to make it the focal point of the piece, which is doable in some cases, but certainly not this one. Then, by placing an abstract render over top the supposed focal point of your piece, it confuses and distracts me.

I don’t know where the render ends, and the rest of the sig continues. Then you used a basic Text, and either placed a pattern layer style, or the rest of the abstract render is on it. Which really looks bad.

1/10

Read full topic

item.title: Vectors
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

I like it simple but cool. I never really did understand the concept on a vector graphic. Id over all give it a 8.5/10. Wish i could cc a lil better but im guessing you use ps in which case i couldnt help ya at all

Read full topic

item.title: Vectors
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:12, topic:178572”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=239593.msg2037788#msg2037788 date=1202434342]

Well, tbh, you shouldn’t take my word seriously. I’ve been banned from enough graphic communities for saying something looked bad when it’s “Highly professional”.

People should not get offended from someones opinion… It is how that person looks at it that matters.
[/quote]

No… If you make a shite piece of work, and think it’s good, you won’t improve. You’ll carry on making the same shit over and over again, unless someone else tells you otherwise.[/quote]

ok scratch the second half of that sentance then. and i dont know i never really listened to any of you and i got better lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Vectors
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:12, topic:178572”]No… If you make a shite piece of work, and think it’s good, you won’t improve. You’ll carry on making the same shit over and over again, unless someone else tells you otherwise.[/quote]Well I must be some stand-alone man here, seeing as these people who I criticize are classed as ‘pro’, even though I can’t see how “Lighting itself” makes something pro. I can’t see how something with so much light on it that it drains all the color out of it is considered good lighting.

spankjava:

we need more people like you in the graphic section not people who are afraid to call to work shit…

No we don’t, we need more people who actually post something constructive, something to help you, not “Shit 1/10 lul im god.” (This isn’t aimed at anyone…)

We already have people who think there good, because they used brushes to make a background, slapped a render on, and then calls it original.
